entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 7 except minus 13 in low lying inland areas.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 7 except minus 13 in low lying inland areas. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023
